job_history.work_description: I lead the Clear Falls High School counseling team to cooperatively plan, implement, and evaluate campus programs and activities consistent with CCISD's expectations for a comprehensive counseling and guidance program. I serve as a resource for students, parents, teachers, counselors, administrators and community groups with the goal of maximizing each student's personal growth and potential.

As a professional educator at a middle school, I pledged to provide my students with a safe and secure classroom, to lead my students through an exploration of traditional and current literature, and to coach my students to develop the critical thinking skills characteristic of an empowered and informed life-long learner.

As a professional educator at an alternative high school, I pledged to assist at-risks teens with an opportunity to recover failed course work, regain confidence in their abilities as a capable learner, and refine their personal expectations for future academic success within a safe and secure classroom.
As the office manager for Clements Certified Consultants, I provided exceptional customer service relations for all clients for the duration of their legal needs.

As a professional educator at a traditional high school, I pledged to provide my students with a safe and secure classroom, to lead my students through an exploration of traditional and current literature, and to coach my students to develop the critical thinking skills characteristic of an empowered and informed life-long learner.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has led teams in various roles, including leading the counseling team at Clear Falls High School, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Counseling
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience as a counselor and has led counseling teams, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Teaching
skills.explanation: Has over a decade of experience as a teacher, including teaching English Language Arts at various levels, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has provided exceptional customer service relations as an administrative assistant and has coached students to develop critical thinking skills, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Program Planning
skills.explanation: Has cooperatively planned, implemented, and evaluated campus programs and activities, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Has managed teams in various roles, including leading the counseling team at Clear Falls High School, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has provided exceptional customer service relations as an administrative assistant, indicating some practical experience.
